DESCRIPTION: Scorched creatures take damage equal to their scorch and lose #b25% of their scorch when #yAttacked
When you obtain #b10 Sacrifice, increase the damage and Block of your [#94bdff]Holy[] cards by 1
When played, gain #ySacrifice equal to energy spent. Obtaining #b10 #ySacrifice increases damage and block gain of [#94bdff]Holy[] cards for the rest of combat.
When a creature obtains #b8 Penance, it loses #b20 HP and HP loss from this effect is increased by #b10 this combat
[#fe513a]Primal[] Cards generate #yVigor equal to the energy spent when played.
#ySealed effects activate whenever you discard a #yStatus or [#fe513a]Primal[] card.
Discard a card and draw a new card to replace it.
#yTribute effects create a #ySeal that Activates after you take or block X damage during your turns. NL At the end of your turn, if you did not you take or block any damage you will lose #b2 HP.
